common.sitter.description.assistants.pro: Choose an event coordinator with years of experience in the field of event organisation who is capable of coordinating any type of event or special event.
common.sitter.description.assistants.bas: Choose a waiter specialised in catering and banqueting services, with experience in catering. The waiter will oversee all stages of the event, from preparation through to packing up the banquet.
common.sitter.description.bartenders.pro: Choose a professional experience with many years of experience and wide knowledge of the Beverage and Mixology sector. Perfect for important events and special occasions in which you need to amaze your guests. At the selected service hours an hour of setup will be added.
common.sitter.description.bartenders.bas: Choose a professional bartender who is able to satisfy customers and understand their needs, an expert in preparing cocktails and drinks. At the selected service time, an hour of set up time will be added
common.sitter.description.cleaners.basic: Choose your professional for cleaning before, during and post event! Cleaning products and equipment are included in the price!

event.brief.description: Event Brief allows you to enter and communicate all the details of your event. When completing the Brief, to better plan the event, it is essential to describe every aspect that is considered important. For any doubt or missing detail that you feel useful You can write to us in chat or contact our team, we will reply as soon as possible.
